title: Advanced Wellness Plus Promotion
summary: This slide promotes the Advanced Wellness Plus program, highlighting limited benefit health insurance plans by American Financial Security Life Insurance Co. The image shows a healthcare professional interacting with a patient.

title: Advanced Wellness Plus Benefits Overview
summary: This slide provides a detailed overview of various medical benefits offered under the Advanced Wellness Plus policy, including hospital confinement, surgery, anesthesia, and more, with coverage amounts varying by plan tier.

title: Overview of Advanced Wellness Plus Benefits
summary: The slide provides information about the National Congress of Employers (NCE), membership details, the billing process, and limited medical coverage. It explains what NCE is, the membership packet, monthly membership billing, and eligibility for limited medical coverage.

title: Advanced Wellness Plus - GapAfford Plus Membership Benefits
summary: The slide outlines the benefits of the GapAfford Plus program, which includes discounts on prescription medication, access to a nationwide vision and dental network, savings on medical services and equipment, and various health-related discounts and services such as alternative medicine, chiropractic care, and hearing savings. It also highlights the availability of a 24/7 health information line and nurse help line.

title: Hospital Indemnity Insurance Limitations & Exclusions
summary: This slide details the limitations and exclusions of a hospital indemnity insurance policy. It outlines scenarios and conditions under which benefits will not be provided, such as non-medically necessary procedures, experimental treatments, and injuries due to certain causes like war, work-related incidents, or illegal occupations. It also includes provisions regarding pre-existing conditions and pregnancy-related coverage. Contact information for claims is provided.
